question: Which of the following statements about “Dinosaurs” is/are correct?
option1: The early man was a contemporary of Dinosaurs
option2: Man appeared first after the Dinosaurs became extinct
option3: The Dinosaurs became extinct about sixty six million years before the appearance of the first man on the earth
option4: The Dinosaurs became extinct about 200 million years before the first man appeared on the earth
answer: The Dinosaurs became extinct about sixty six million years before the appearance of the first man on the earth
explanation: As originally proposed in 1980 by a team of scientists led by Luis Alvarez and his son Walter Alvarez, it is now generally thought that the extinction was caused by the impact of a massive comet or asteroid 10 to 15 km  wide, 66 million years ago, which devastated the global environment.
